plugins\/autoconso\/core\/class\/autocon.error missing injection: Electricity injection measure is mandatory to manage auto-consumption
plugins\/autoconso\/core\/class\/autocon.error missing power: Configuration of estimated power is mandatory
plugins\/autoconso\/core\/class\/autocon.error missing state: Configuration of state information (on/off) is mandatory
plugins\/autoconso\/core\/class\/autocon.error missing cmdOn: Configuration of ON command is mandatory
plugins\/autoconso\/core\/class\/autocon.error missing cmdOff: Configuration of OFF command is mandatory

plugins\/autoconso\/desktop\/php\/autoco.Aucun équipement Autoconso, cliquer sur: No Autoconso equipment, click on "Add" to begin
plugins\/autoconso\/desktop\/php\/autoco.Total injection helper: Equipment returning the total instant electricity injection of the house
plugins\/autoconso\/desktop\/php\/autoco.Solar production helper: Equipment returning the instant solar electricity production
plugins\/autoconso\/desktop\/php\/autoco.security margin helper: Security margin to apply on the total injection (Watt) Can be a number or a command from another equipment
plugins\/autoconso\/desktop\/php\/autoco.Safety cron helper: Security cron for regular check (in case triggers are not working well)
